theSenseless:CardForgottenTechnique.NAME: Forgotten Technique
theSenseless:CardForgottenTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Wilt a card from your Discard Pile.
theSenseless:CardForgottenTechnique.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION:
Retain.
Wilt a card from your Discard Pile.

theSenseless:CardDejaVu.NAME: Deja Vu
theSenseless:CardDejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Wilt a card from your Exhaust Pile.

theSenseless:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theSenseless:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theSenseless:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theSenseless:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theSenseless:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theSenseless:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theSenseless:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theSenseless:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theSenseless:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theSenseless:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theSenseless:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theSenseless:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theSenseless:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
